subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:

Court may rule on Smith baby
A Bahamian court may rule Tuesday on who is the father of Anna Nicole Smith's baby daughter, Dannielynn.

10. Panel subpoenas Gonzales documents




 
















Offensive couch label?
A racial slur is found on one family's couch tag. Affiliate CityNews reports. (April 10)
